name: Kinniku Banzuke Vol. 3: Saikyou no Challenger Tanjou!
overview: Kinniku Banzuke (Muscle Ranking), an enormously popular program that aired weekly between 1995 and 2002, and Sasuke, a twice-a-year special that’s still going strong. The premise of Kinniku Banzuke, as reflected in several Muscle Park games, is simple. Competitors must knock down nine numbered plates of a target using various sports apparatus, including Frisbees, baseballs and darts. Participants on the show included top athletes and qualified amateurs. This is the third game in the series and features different events from the previous games and for the first time the multi-tap mode option.
